lang_name.chinesesimplified: 我们已经到了目的地了，傍晚这个时间正好钓鱼，鱼群很活跃呢。
lang_name.english: We've reached our destination, and it's just the right time to go fishing in the evening, with the fish being particularly active.

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 这是你生涯第一条鱼，能卖不少钱呢。去钓更多的鱼来赢得属于自己的传奇鱼竿吧。
lang_name.english: This is your first fish in life, and it can sell for a lot of money. Go catch more fish to win your own legendary fishing rod.

lang_name.chinesesimplified: 我们也可以通过用更换鱼饵的方式来尝试钓更多种类的鱼。
lang_name.english: We can also try to catch more types of fish by changing the bait.
Seek out a great fishing location
